name: FNF Manik & Panik! 1.0
description:
Panik is a roblox game where you have to hide from a robot and collect items to escape the store you are trapped in. And now Happy The
Robot is here in FNF! This mod was made by: RanDUMBness (Me): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9cL4N2_MN7COUWVhY2C_hw and KingPotato17: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcuuZuapCKP5s9ugVKNA3xg
